sense.def:
Z besedo
civil
opisujemo stvari, povezane s prebivalci neke države, njihovimi pravicami in dejavnostmi, pogosto kot nasprotje oboroženih sil.

seg.quote: ...the defence of civil liberties and human rights.

sense.def:
Kdor je
civil
, se vede uglajeno.

seg.quote: He'd been careful to be civil to everyone.
He was somewhat upset but he answered civilly enough.
